couldNotBeFetch.description: Message to show when the icon request fail

couldNotBeFetchErrorStatusCode.description: Message to show when the icon request fail

elementDuplicated.description: Message to show when the 'apple-touch-icon' element is duplicated
elementDuplicated.message: 'apple-touch-icon' link element is not needed as one was already specified.

elementNotInHead.description: Message to show when the element is not in the head
elementNotInHead.message: 'apple-touch-icon' link element should be specified in the '<head>'.

failedToFecth.description: Debug information to show when fetch fails

getImageDataFailed.description: Debug information to show when getImageData fails

invalidPNG.description: Message to show when the icon is an invalid PNG
invalidPNG.message: '%s' should be a valid PNG image.

noElement.description: Message to show when a link element doesn't exist

noEmptyHref.description: Message to show when a link element has an href empty
noEmptyHref.message: 'apple-touch-icon' link element should have non-empty 'href' attribute.

shouldBePNG.description: Message to show when the icon is not a PNG

sizesAttribute.description: Message to show when the element specify the attribute sizes
sizesAttribute.message: apple-touch-icon' link element should not have 'sizes' attribute.

wrongRelAttribute.description: Message to show when the rel attribute is not the right one

wrongResolution.description: Message to show when the icon doesn't have the right resolution
